meanings.definition: The quality or state of being votive.
meanings.sent1: The votivenesses of the candles in the church created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the votivenesses of the ancient ritual in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The votivenesses of the colorful decorations made the party feel special.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the votivenesses of a true believer.
meanings.sent5: The votivenesses of the memorial statue moved all who visited.

meanings.definition: The act of making a vow or offering.
meanings.sent1: The votivenesses of the ceremony were evident in the solemn promises made.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of relief after fulfilling her votivenesses to the gods.
meanings.sent3: His votivenesses to always eat dessert first amused his friends.
meanings.sent4: The votivenesses of the sacrifice echoed through the ancient temple.
meanings.sent5: The votivenesses of the donation touched the hearts of many in need.
